name: Frostbite (itch) (probablyjes)
description:
______________________________________________________________________________

After making business with the wrong people, they have decided to pay Kira back by abducting her little brother Nikita one day. Immediately having a hunch about such a thing, she goes and searches for him, hoping she'll get him back safely.

_______________________________________________________________________________

Controls

MechanicMouse + keyboardControllerMove + Look
WASD + MouseLeft and Right Thumbstick
(Wall-)Jump
SpaceButton SouthCrouch
Left ShiftLeft TriggerPauseEscSpecial Right

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
